name: Test_quotable_api_with_tags_quotes_queryparams

children.description: Given the api is composed of "https://api.quotable.io/"
Given A call to quotable api with path as "quotes"

Then validate the api with following multiple queryparams
| property | value |
| tags | famous-quotes,wisdom |
| author | Confucius |

reportData.title: Response Body with status code : 200
reportData.contents:
{
    "count": 20,

    "results": [
        {
            "tags": [

            ],
            "_id": "6Kl3UT6ULk",
            "content": "Wisdom, compassion, and courage are the three universally recognized moral qualities of men.",
            "author": "Confucius",
            "authorSlug": "confucius",
            "length": 92,
            "dateAdded": "2021-05-12",
            "dateModified": "2021-05-12"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes"
            ],
            "_id": "Oh-e1-oygRPX",
            "content": "To be wronged is nothing unless you continue to remember it.",
            "author": "Confucius",
            "authorSlug": "confucius",
            "length": 60,
            "dateAdded": "2021-05-12",
            "dateModified": "2021-05-12"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes"
            ],
            "_id": "LPtv5gxsvhsr",
            "content": "If you look into your own heart, and you find nothing wrong there, what is there to worry about? What is there to fear?",
            "author": "Confucius",
            "authorSlug": "confucius",
            "length": 119,
            "dateAdded": "2021-05-05",
            "dateModified": "2021-05-05"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes"
            ],
            "_id": "P77hDIkrjYP",
            "content": "Study the past, if you would divine the future.",
            "author": "Confucius",
            "authorSlug": "confucius",
            "length": 47,
            "dateAdded": "2021-04-23",
            "dateModified": "2021-04-23"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes"
            ],
            "_id": "IxrwsheO2w6",
            "content": "Wherever you go, go with all your heart.",
            "author": "Confucius",
            "authorSlug": "confucius",
            "length": 40,
            "dateAdded": "2021-04-23",
            "dateModified": "2021-04-23"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes"
            ],
            "_id": "u80cGRXHeCeH",
            "content": "When you see a good person, think of becoming like him. When you see someone not so good, reflect on your own weak points.",
            "author": "Confucius",
            "authorSlug": "confucius",
            "length": 122,
            "dateAdded": "2021-04-08",
            "dateModified": "2021-04-08"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes"
            ],
            "_id": "ALcsEfDR7FL",
            "content": "The cautious seldom err.",
            "author": "Confucius",
            "authorSlug": "confucius",
            "length": 24,
            "dateAdded": "2021-03-28",
            "dateModified": "2021-03-28"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes"
            ],
            "_id": "AOZZPqNwJWMZ",
            "content": "He who wishes to secure the good of others, has already secured his own.",
            "author": "Confucius",
            "authorSlug": "confucius",
            "length": 72,
            "dateAdded": "2021-03-26",
            "dateModified": "2021-03-26"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes"
            ],
            "_id": "Yk5zlxPAS_M7",
            "content": "I hear and I forget. I see and I remember. I do and I understand.",
            "author": "Confucius",
            "authorSlug": "confucius",
            "length": 65,
            "dateAdded": "2021-03-26",
            "dateModified": "2021-03-26"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes"
            ],
            "_id": "TdIyDe0XX542",
            "content": "Learning without reflection is a waste, reflection without learning is dangerous.",
            "author": "Confucius",
            "authorSlug": "confucius",
            "length": 81,
            "dateAdded": "2020-12-08",
            "dateModified": "2020-12-08"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes"
            ],
            "_id": "ahrACwvb84Z4",
            "content": "I want you to be everything that's you, deep at the center of your being.",
            "author": "Confucius",
            "authorSlug": "confucius",
            "length": 73,
            "dateAdded": "2020-10-29",
            "dateModified": "2020-10-29"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes"
            ],
            "_id": "hfevjsHROQiB",
            "content": "Being in humaneness is good. If we select other goodness and thus are far apart from humaneness, how can we be the wise?",
            "author": "Confucius",
            "authorSlug": "confucius",
            "length": 120,
            "dateAdded": "2020-10-14",
            "dateModified": "2020-10-14"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes"
            ],
            "_id": "C71_HiGpvT2j",
            "content": "The superior man is satisfied and composed; the mean man is always full of distress.",
            "author": "Confucius",
            "authorSlug": "confucius",
            "length": 84,
            "dateAdded": "2020-06-24",
            "dateModified": "2020-06-24"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes",
                "wisdom"
            ],
            "_id": "3sJ6JeUcIf6C",
            "content": "When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.",
            "author": "Confucius",
            "authorSlug": "confucius",
            "length": 101,
            "dateAdded": "2020-06-24",
            "dateModified": "2020-06-24"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "wisdom"
            ],
            "_id": "RcVCmaE4Ti",
            "content": "By three methods we may learn wisdom: First, by reflection, which is noblest; Second, by imitation, which is easiest; and third by experience, which is the bitterest.",
            "author": "Confucius",
            "authorSlug": "confucius",
            "length": 166,
            "dateAdded": "2020-04-14",
            "dateModified": "2020-04-14"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes"
            ],
            "_id": "RKOxn5gYEO33",
            "content": "To study and not think is a waste. To think and not study is dangerous.",
            "author": "Confucius",
            "authorSlug": "confucius",
            "length": 71,
            "dateAdded": "2020-03-27",
            "dateModified": "2020-03-27"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes"
            ],
            "_id": "NsDoqkwD8ysy",
            "content": "Reviewing what you have learned and learning anew, you are fit to be a teacher.",
            "author": "Confucius",
            "authorSlug": "confucius",
            "length": 79,
            "dateAdded": "2020-03-15",
            "dateModified": "2020-03-15"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes"
            ],
            "_id": "COOYD278-JAr",
            "content": "The superior man is modest in his speech but exceeds in his actions.",
            "author": "Confucius",
            "authorSlug": "confucius",
            "length": 68,
            "dateAdded": "2020-03-11",
            "dateModified": "2021-06-17"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes"
            ],
            "_id": "OSaopvW0IUd",
            "content": "The more you know yourself, the more you forgive yourself.",
            "author": "Confucius",
            "authorSlug": "confucius",
            "length": 58,
            "dateAdded": "2020-03-11",
            "dateModified": "2020-03-11"
        },
        {
            "tags": [
                "famous-quotes"
            ],
            "_id": "GbjRau4Ef2cZ",
            "content": "When you meet someone better than yourself, turn your thoughts to becoming his equal. When you meet someone not as good as you are, look within and examine your own self.",
            "author": "Confucius",
            "authorSlug": "confucius",
            "length": 170,
            "dateAdded": "2020-03-11",
            "dateModified": "2020-03-11"
        }
    ]
}

userStory.narrative: I want to automate the QuotableAPI and validate the various functionalities

title: Test quotable api with tags quotes queryparams

scenarioOutline:

Then validate the api with following multiple queryparams
|property | value|
